run_rprofile_on_resume.title: Run .Rprofile on resume
run_rprofile_on_resume.description: Whether to run .Rprofile again after resuming a suspended R session.

save_workspace.title: Save workspace on quit
save_workspace.description: Whether to save the workspace to an .Rdata file after the R session ends.

load_workspace.title: Load workspace on start
load_workspace.description: Whether to load the workspace when the R session begins.

initial_working_directory.title: Initial working directory
initial_working_directory.description: The initial working directory for new R sessions.

name.description: The name of the default CRAN mirror.

host.description: The host of the default CRAN mirror.

url.description: The URL of the default CRAN mirror.

country.description: The country of the default CRAN mirror.

secondary.description: A pipe-separated list of secondary repositories.

bioconductor_mirror_name.description: The name of the default Bioconductor mirror.

bioconductor_mirror_url.description: The URL of the default Bioconductor mirror.

always_save_history.title: Save R console history
always_save_history.description: Whether to always save the R console history.

remove_history_duplicates.title: Remove duplicates from console history
remove_history_duplicates.description: Whether to remove duplicate entries from the R console history.

show_last_dot_value.title: Show .Last.value in Environment pane
show_last_dot_value.description: Show the result of the last expression (.Last.value) in the Environment pane.

line_ending_conversion.title: Line ending format
line_ending_conversion.description: The line ending format to use when saving files.

use_newlines_in_makefiles.title: Use newlines in Makefiles
use_newlines_in_makefiles.description: Whether to use newlines when saving Makefiles.

windows_terminal_shell.description: The terminal shell to use on Windows.

posix_terminal_shell.description: The terminal shell to use on POSIX operating systems (MacOS and Linux).

custom_shell_command.description: The fully qualified path to the custom shell command to use in the Terminal tab.

custom_shell_options.description: The command-line options to pass to the custom shell command.

show_line_numbers.title: Show line numbers in editor
show_line_numbers.description: Show line numbers in RStudio's code editor.

relative_line_numbers.title: Use relative line numbers in editor
relative_line_numbers.description: Show relative, rather than absolute, line numbers in RStudio's code editor.

highlight_selected_word.title: Highlight selected word in editor
highlight_selected_word.description: Highlight the selected word in RStudio's code editor.

highlight_selected_line.title: Highlight selected line in editor
highlight_selected_line.description: Highlight the selected line in RStudio's code editor.

tabSet1.description: The panes included in the first tabset.

tabSet2.description: The panes included in the second tabset.

hiddenTabSet.description: The panes hidden from the user.

console_left_on_top.description: Whether the console is on top when it is on the left side of the workbench.

console_right_on_top.description: Whether the console is on top when it is on the right side of the workbench.

additional_source_columns.description: The number of columns of full source columns.

panes.description: Layout of panes in the RStudio workbench.

allow_source_columns.title: Allow source columns
allow_source_columns.description: Whether to enable the ability to add source columns to display.

use_spaces_for_tab.title: Insert spaces for Tab
use_spaces_for_tab.description: Whether to insert spaces when pressing the Tab key.

num_spaces_for_tab.title: Number of spaces for Tab
num_spaces_for_tab.description: The number of spaces to insert when pressing the Tab key.

auto_detect_indentation.title: Auto-detect indentation in files
auto_detect_indentation.description: Whether to automatically detect indentation settings from file contents.

show_margin.title: Show margin in editor
show_margin.description: Whether to show the margin guide in the RStudio code editor.

blinking_cursor.title: Use a blinking cursor
blinking_cursor.description: Whether to flash the cursor off and on.

margin_column.title: Margin column
margin_column.description: The number of columns of text after which the margin is shown.

show_invisibles.title: Show invisible characters in editor
show_invisibles.description: Whether to show invisible characters, such as spaces and tabs, in the RStudio code editor.

indent_guides.title: Indentation guides
indent_guides.description: Style for indentation guides in the RStudio code editor.

continue_comments_on_newline.title: Continue comments after adding new line
continue_comments_on_newline.description: Whether to continue comments (by inserting the comment character) after adding a new line.

highlight_web_link.title: Whether web links in comments are clickable
highlight_web_link.description: Whether web links in comments are clickable.

editor_keybindings.title: Keybinding set for editor
editor_keybindings.description: The keybindings to use in the RStudio code editor.

insert_matching.title: Auto-insert matching parentheses and brackets
insert_matching.description: Whether to insert matching pairs, such as () and [], when the first is typed.

insert_spaces_around_equals.title: Insert spaces around = in R code
insert_spaces_around_equals.description: Whether to insert spaces around the equals sign in R code.

insert_parens_after_function_completion.title: Insert parentheses after functions
insert_parens_after_function_completion.description: Whether to insert parentheses after function completions.

tab_multiline_completion.title: Complete multi-line statements with Tab
tab_multiline_completion.description: Whether to attempt completion of multiple-line statements when pressing Tab.

tab_completion.title: Use Tab to trigger autocompletion
tab_completion.description: Whether to attempt completion of statements when pressing Tab.

show_help_tooltip_on_idle.title: Show function help tooltips on idle
show_help_tooltip_on_idle.description: Whether to show help tooltips for functions when the cursor has not been recently moved.

surround_selection.title: Surround selections with
surround_selection.description: Which kinds of delimiters can be used to surround the current selection.

enable_snippets.title: Enable code snippets
enable_snippets.description: Whether to enable code snippets in the RStudio code editor.

code_completion.title: Use code completion for R
code_completion.description: When to use auto-completion for R code in the RStudio code editor.

code_completion_other.title: Use code completion for other languages
code_completion_other.description: When to use auto-completion for other languages (such as JavaScript and SQL) in the RStudio code editor.

console_code_completion.title: Use code completion in the R console
console_code_completion.description: Whether to always use code completion in the R console.

code_completion_delay.title: Delay before completing code (ms)
code_completion_delay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before offering code suggestions.

code_completion_characters.title: Number of characters for code completion
code_completion_characters.description: The number of characters in a symbol that can be entered before completions are offered.

code_completion_include_already_used.title: Include all function arguments in completion list
code_completion_include_already_used.description: When set, RStudio will include all function arguments in the completion list, even if those arguments have already appeared to be used in the current function invocation.

show_function_signature_tooltips.title: Show function signature tooltips
show_function_signature_tooltips.description: Whether to show function signature tooltips during autocompletion.

show_data_preview.title: Show data preview in autocompletion help popup
show_data_preview.description: Whether a data preview is shown in the autocompletion help popup for datasets and values.

show_diagnostics_r.title: Show diagnostics in R code
show_diagnostics_r.description: Whether to show diagnostic messages (such as syntax and usage errors) for R code as you type.

show_diagnostics_cpp.title: Show diagnostics in C++ code
show_diagnostics_cpp.description: Whether to show diagnostic messages for C++ code as you type.

show_diagnostics_yaml.title: Show diagnostics in YAML code
show_diagnostics_yaml.description: Whether to show diagnostic messages for YAML code as you type.

show_diagnostics_other.title: Show diagnostics in other languages
show_diagnostics_other.description: Whether to show diagnostic messages for other types of code (not R, C++, or YAML).

style_diagnostics.title: Show style diagnostics for R code
style_diagnostics.description: Whether to show style diagnostics (suggestions for improving R code style)

diagnostics_on_save.title: Check code for problems when saving
diagnostics_on_save.description: Whether to check code for problems after saving it.

background_diagnostics.title: Run R code diagnostics in the background
background_diagnostics.description: Whether to run code diagnostics in the background, as you type.

background_diagnostics_delay_ms.title: Run R code diagnostics after (ms)
background_diagnostics_delay_ms.description: The number of milliseconds to delay before running code diagnostics in the background.

diagnostics_in_r_function_calls.title: Run diagnostics on R function calls
diagnostics_in_r_function_calls.description: Whether to run diagnostics in R function calls.

check_arguments_to_r_function_calls.title: Check arguments to R function calls
check_arguments_to_r_function_calls.description: Whether to check arguments to R function calls.

check_unexpected_assignment_in_function_.title: Check for unexpected assignments
check_unexpected_assignment_in_function_.description: Whether to check for unexpected variable assignments inside R function calls.

warn_if_no_such_variable_in_scope.title: Warn when R variable used but not defined
warn_if_no_such_variable_in_scope.description: Whether to generate a warning if a variable is used without being defined in the current scope.

warn_variable_defined_but_not_used.title: Warn when R variable defined but not used
warn_variable_defined_but_not_used.description: Whether to generate a warning if a variable is defined without being used in the current scope

auto_discover_package_dependencies.title: Detect missing R packages in the editor
auto_discover_package_dependencies.description: Whether to automatically discover and offer to install missing R package dependencies.

auto_append_newline.title: Ensure files end with a newline when saving
auto_append_newline.description: Whether to ensure that source files end with a newline character.

strip_trailing_whitespace.title: Strip trailing whitespace when saving
strip_trailing_whitespace.description: Whether to strip trailing whitespace from each line when saving.

restore_source_document_cursor_position.title: Restore cursor position when reopening files
restore_source_document_cursor_position.description: Whether to save the position of the cursor when a file is closed, restore it when the file is opened.

reindent_on_paste.title: Re-indent code when pasting
reindent_on_paste.description: Whether to automatically re-indent code when it's pasted into RStudio.

vertically_align_arguments_indent.title: Vertically align function arguments
vertically_align_arguments_indent.description: Whether to vertically align arguments to R function calls during automatic indentation.

soft_wrap_r_files.title: Soft-wrap source files
soft_wrap_r_files.description: Whether to soft-wrap source files, wrapping the text for display without inserting newline characters.

soft_wrap_rmd_files.title: Soft-wrap R Markdown files
soft_wrap_rmd_files.description: Whether to soft-wrap R Markdown files (and similar types such as R HTML and R Notebooks)

focus_console_after_exec.title: Focus console after executing R code
focus_console_after_exec.description: Whether to focus the R console after executing an R command from a script.

fold_style.title: Fold style in editor
fold_style.description: The style of folding to use.

save_before_sourcing.title: Save R scripts before sourcing
save_before_sourcing.description: Whether to automatically save scripts before executing them.

syntax_color_console.title: Syntax highlighting in R console
syntax_color_console.description: Whether to use syntax highlighting in the R console.

highlight_console_errors.title: Different color for error output in R console
highlight_console_errors.description: Whether to display error, warning, and message output in a different color.

scroll_past_end_of_document.title: Scroll past end of file
scroll_past_end_of_document.description: Whether to allow scrolling past the end of a file.

highlight_r_function_calls.title: Highlight R function calls
highlight_r_function_calls.description: Whether to highlight R function calls in the code editor.

color_preview.title: Enable preview of named and hexadecimal colors
color_preview.description: Whether to show preview for named and hexadecimal colors.

rainbow_parentheses.title: Use rainbow parentheses
rainbow_parentheses.description: Whether to highlight parentheses in a variety of colors.

rainbow_fenced_divs.title: Use rainbow fenced divs
rainbow_fenced_divs.description: Whether to highlight fenced divs in a variety of colors.

console_line_length_limit.title: Maximum characters per line in R console
console_line_length_limit.description: The maximum number of characters to display in a single line in the R console.

console_max_lines.title: Maximum lines in R console
console_max_lines.description: The maximum number of console actions to store and display in the console scrollback buffer.

ansi_console_mode.title: ANSI escape codes in R console
ansi_console_mode.description: How to treat ANSI escape codes in the console.

limit_visible_console.title: Limit visible console output
limit_visible_console.description: Whether to only show a limited window of the total console output

show_inline_toolbar_for_r_code_chunks.title: Show toolbar on R Markdown chunks
show_inline_toolbar_for_r_code_chunks.description: Whether to show a toolbar on code chunks in R Markdown documents.

highlight_code_chunks.title: Highlight code chunks in R Markdown files
highlight_code_chunks.description: Whether to highlight code chunks in R Markdown documents with a different background color.

save_files_before_build.title: Save files before building
save_files_before_build.description: Whether to save all open, unsaved files before building the project.

save_and_reload_workspace_on_build.title: Save and reload R workspace on build
save_and_reload_workspace_on_build.description: Whether RStudio should save and reload the R workspace when building the project.

font_size_points.title: Editor font size (points)
font_size_points.description: The default editor font size, in points.

editor_line_height.title: Editor line height
editor_line_height.description: The editor line height, as a percentage of the font size.

help_font_size_points.title: Help panel font size (points)
help_font_size_points.description: The help panel font size, in points.

editor_theme.title: Theme
editor_theme.description: The name of the color theme to apply to the text editor in RStudio.

server_editor_font_enabled.title: Enable editor fonts on RStudio Server
server_editor_font_enabled.description: Whether to use a custom editor font in RStudio Server.

server_editor_font.title: Editor font
server_editor_font.description: The name of the fixed-width editor font to use with RStudio Server.

default_encoding.title: Default character encoding
default_encoding.description: The default character encoding to use when saving files.

toolbar_visible.title: Show top toolbar
toolbar_visible.description: Whether to show the toolbar at the top of the RStudio workbench.

default_project_location.title: Default new project location
default_project_location.description: The directory path under which to place new projects by default.

default_open_project_location.title: Default open project location
default_open_project_location.description: The default directory to use in file dialogs when opening a project.

source_with_echo.title: Source with echo by default
source_with_echo.description: Whether to echo R code when sourcing it.

default_sweave_engine.title: Default Sweave engine
default_sweave_engine.description: The default engine to use when processing Sweave documents.

default_latex_program.title: Default LaTeX program
default_latex_program.description: The default program to use when processing LaTeX documents.

use_roxygen.title: Use Roxygen for documentation
use_roxygen.description: Whether to use Roxygen for documentation.

use_dataimport.title: Enable data import
use_dataimport.description: Whether to use RStudio's data import feature.

pdf_previewer.title: PDF previewer
pdf_previewer.description: The program to use to preview PDF files after generation.

always_enable_rnw_concordance.title: Enable Rnw concordance
always_enable_rnw_concordance.description: Whether to always enable the concordance for RNW files.

insert_numbered_latex_sections.title: Insert numbered LaTeX sections
insert_numbered_latex_sections.description: Whether to insert numbered sections in LaTeX.

spelling_dictionary_language.title: Spelling dictionary language
spelling_dictionary_language.description: The language of the spelling dictionary to use for spell checking.

spelling_custom_dictionaries.title: Custom spelling dictionaries
spelling_custom_dictionaries.description: The list of custom dictionaries to use when spell checking.

document_load_lint_delay.title: Lint document after load (ms)
document_load_lint_delay.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before linting a document after it is loaded.

ignore_uppercase_words.title: Ignore uppercase words in spell check
ignore_uppercase_words.description: Whether to ignore words in uppercase when spell checking.

ignore_words_with_numbers.title: Ignore words with numbers in spell check
ignore_words_with_numbers.description: Whether to ignore words with numbers in them when spell checking.

real_time_spellchecking.title: Use real-time spellchecking
real_time_spellchecking.description: Whether to enable real-time spellchecking by default.

navigate_to_build_error.title: Navigate to build errors
navigate_to_build_error.description: Whether to navigate to build errors.

packages_pane_enabled.title: Enable the Packages pane
packages_pane_enabled.description: Whether to enable RStudio's Packages pane.

restore_source_documents.title: Restore last opened documents on startup
restore_source_documents.description: Whether to restore the last opened source documents when RStudio starts up.

handle_errors_in_user_code_only.title: Handle errors only when user code present
handle_errors_in_user_code_only.description: Whether to handle errors only when user code is on the stack.

auto_expand_error_tracebacks.title: Auto-expand error tracebacks
auto_expand_error_tracebacks.description: Whether to automatically expand tracebacks when an error occurs.

check_for_updates.title: Check for new version at startup
check_for_updates.description: Whether to check for new versions of RStudio when RStudio starts.

show_internal_functions.title: Show internal functions when debugging
show_internal_functions.description: Whether to show functions without source references in the Traceback pane while debugging.

shiny_viewer_type.title: Run Shiny applications in
shiny_viewer_type.description: Where to display Shiny applications when they are run.

shiny_background_jobs.title: Run Shiny applications in the background
shiny_background_jobs.description: Whether to run Shiny applications as background jobs.

plumber_viewer_type.title: Run Plumber APIs in
plumber_viewer_type.description: Where to display Shiny applications when they are run.

document_author.title: Document author
document_author.description: The default name to use as the document author when creating new documents.

rmd_auto_date.title: Use current date when rendering document
rmd_auto_date.description: Use current date when rendering document

rmd_preferred_template_path.title: Path to preferred R Markdown template
rmd_preferred_template_path.description: The path to the preferred R Markdown template.

rmd_viewer_type.title: Display R Markdown documents in
rmd_viewer_type.description: Where to display R Markdown documents when they have completed rendering.

show_publish_diagnostics.title: Show diagnostic info when publishing
show_publish_diagnostics.description: Whether to show verbose diagnostic information when publishing content.

enable_cloud_publish_ui.description: Whether to show UI for publishing content to Posit Cloud.

publish_check_certificates.title: Check SSL certificates when publishing
publish_check_certificates.description: Whether to check remote server SSL certificates when publishing content.

use_publish_ca_bundle.title: Use custom CA bundle when publishing
use_publish_ca_bundle.description: Whether to use a custom certificate authority (CA) bundle when publishing content.

publish_ca_bundle.title: Path to custom CA bundle for publishing
publish_ca_bundle.description: The path to the custom certificate authority (CA) bundle to use when publishing content.

rmd_chunk_output_inline.title: Show chunk output inline in all documents
rmd_chunk_output_inline.description: Whether to show chunk output inline for ordinary R Markdown documents.

show_doc_outline_rmd.title: Open document outline by default
show_doc_outline_rmd.description: Whether to show the document outline by default when opening R Markdown documents.

document_outline_font_size.title: Document outline font size
document_outline_font_size.description: The font size to use for items in the document outline.

auto_run_setup_chunk.title: Automatically run Setup chunk when needed
auto_run_setup_chunk.description: Whether to automatically run an R Markdown document's Setup chunk before running other chunks.

hide_console_on_chunk_execute.title: Hide console when running R Markdown chunks
hide_console_on_chunk_execute.description: Whether to hide the R console when executing inline R Markdown chunks.

execution_behavior.title: Unit of R code execution
execution_behavior.description: The unit of R code to execute when the Execute command is invoked.

show_terminal_tab.title: Show the Terminal tab
show_terminal_tab.description: Whether to show the Terminal tab.

terminal_local_echo.title: Use local echo in the Terminal
terminal_local_echo.description: Whether to use local echo in the Terminal.

terminal_websockets.title: Use websockets in the Terminal
terminal_websockets.description: Whether to use websockets to communicate with the shell in the Terminal tab.

terminal_close_behavior.title: Close Terminal pane after shell exit
terminal_close_behavior.description: Whether to close the terminal pane after the shell exits.

terminal_track_environment.title: Save and restore system environment in Terminal tab
terminal_track_environment.description: Whether to track and save changes to system environment variables in the Terminal.

terminal_ignored_environment_variables.title: Ignored environment variables
terminal_ignored_environment_variables.description: Environment variables which should be ignored when tracking changed to environment variables within a Terminal. Environment variables in this list will not be saved when a Terminal instance is saved and restored.

terminal_hooks.title: Enable Terminal hooks
terminal_hooks.description: Enabled Terminal hooks? Required for Python terminal integration, which places the active version of Python on the PATH in new Terminal sessions.

terminal_renderer.title: Terminal tab rendering engine
terminal_renderer.description: Terminal rendering engine: canvas is faster, dom may be needed for some browsers or graphics cards

terminal_weblinks.title: Make links in Terminal clickable
terminal_weblinks.description: Whether web links displayed in the Terminal tab are made clickable.

show_rmd_render_command.title: Show R Markdown render command
show_rmd_render_command.description: Whether to print the render command use to knit R Markdown documents in the R Markdown tab.

enable_text_drag.title: Enable dragging text in code editor
enable_text_drag.description: Whether to enable moving text on the editing surface by clicking and dragging it.

show_hidden_files.title: Show hidden files in Files pane
show_hidden_files.description: Whether to show hidden files in the Files pane.

always_shown_files.description: List of file names (case sensitive) that are always shown in the Files Pane, regardless of whether hidden files are shown
always_shown_files.title: Files always shown in the Files Pane

always_shown_extensions.description: List of file extensions (beginning with ., not case sensitive) that are always shown in the Files Pane, regardless of whether hidden files are shown
always_shown_extensions.title: Extensions always shown in the Files Pane

sort_file_names_naturally.title: Sort file names naturally in Files pane
sort_file_names_naturally.description: Whether to sort file names naturally, so that e.g., file10.R comes after file9.R

sync_files_pane_working_dir.title: Synchronize the Files pane with the current working directory
sync_files_pane_working_dir.description: Whether to change the directory in the Files pane automatically when the working directory in R changes.

jobs_tab_visibility.title: Jobs tab visibility
jobs_tab_visibility.description: The visibility of the Jobs tab.

show_launcher_jobs_tab.description: Whether to show the Workbench Jobs tab in RStudio Pro and RStudio Workbench.

launcher_jobs_sort.description: How to sort jobs in the Workbench Jobs tab in RStudio Pro and RStudio Workbench.

busy_detection.description: How to detect busy status in the Terminal.

busy_exclusion_list.description: A list of apps that should not be considered busy in the Terminal.

knit_working_dir.title: Working directory for knitting
knit_working_dir.description: The working directory to use when knitting R Markdown documents.

doc_outline_show.title: Show in Document Outline
doc_outline_show.description: Which objects to show in the document outline pane.

latex_preview_on_cursor_idle.title: Preview LaTeX equations on idle
latex_preview_on_cursor_idle.description: When to preview LaTeX mathematical equations when cursor has not moved recently.

wrap_tab_navigation.title: Wrap around when going to previous/next tab
wrap_tab_navigation.description: Whether to wrap around when going to the previous or next editor tab.

global_theme.title: Global theme
global_theme.description: The theme to use for the main RStudio user interface.

git_diff_ignore_whitespace.title: Ignore whitespace in VCS diffs
git_diff_ignore_whitespace.description: Whether to ignore whitespace when generating diffs of version controlled files.

console_double_click_select.title: Double click to select in the Console
console_double_click_select.description: Whether double-clicking should select a word in the Console pane.

console_suspend_blocked_notice.title: Warn when automatic session suspension is paused
console_suspend_blocked_notice.description: Whether the 'Auto Suspension Blocked' icon should appear in the R Console toolbar.

console_suspend_blocked_notice_delay.title: Number of seconds to delay warning
console_suspend_blocked_notice_delay.description: How long to wait before warning that automatic session suspension has been paused. Higher values for less frequent notices.

new_proj_git_init.title: Create a Git repo in new projects
new_proj_git_init.description: Whether a git repo should be initialized inside new projects by default.

new_proj_use_renv.title: Create an renv environment in new projects
new_proj_use_renv.description: Whether an renv environment should be created inside new projects by default.

root_document.title: Root document for PDF compilation
root_document.description: The root document to use when compiling PDF documents.

show_user_home_page.title: Show user home page in RStudio Workbench
show_user_home_page.description: When to show the server home page in RStudio Workbench.

reuse_sessions_for_project_links.description: Whether to reuse sessions when opening projects in RStudio Workbench.

vcs_enabled.title: Enable version control if available
vcs_enabled.description: Whether to enable RStudio's version control system interface.

git_exe_path.title: Path to Git executable
git_exe_path.description: The path to the Git executable to use.

svn_exe_path.title: Path to Subversion executable
svn_exe_path.description: The path to the Subversion executable to use.

terminal_path.description: The path to the terminal executable to use.

rsa_key_path.description: The path to the SSH key file to use.

ssh_key_type.description: The encryption type to use for the SSH key file.

use_devtools.title: Use the devtools R package if available
use_devtools.description: Whether to use the devtools R package.

use_build_subdirectory.title: Use alternate library path when building package
use_build_subdirectory.description: When set, RStudio will build your package in a '_build' sub-directory of your current library paths.

use_secure_download.title: Download R packages securely
use_secure_download.description: Whether to use secure downloads when fetching R packages.

cleanup_after_r_cmd_check.title: Clean up temporary files after R CMD CHECK
cleanup_after_r_cmd_check.description: Whether to clean up temporary files after running R CMD CHECK.

view_dir_after_r_cmd_check.title: View directory after R CMD CHECK
view_dir_after_r_cmd_check.description: Whether to view the directory after running R CMD CHECK.

hide_object_files.title: Hide object files in the Files pane
hide_object_files.description: Whether to hide object files in the Files pane.

restore_last_project.title: Restore last project when starting RStudio
restore_last_project.description: Whether to restore the last project when starting RStudio.

project_safe_startup_seconds.title: Number of seconds for safe project startup
project_safe_startup_seconds.description: The number of seconds after which a project is deemed to have successfully started.

clean_texi2dvi_output.title: Clean output after running Texi2Dvi
clean_texi2dvi_output.description: Whether to clean output after running Texi2Dvi.

latex_shell_escape.title: Shell escape LaTeX documents
latex_shell_escape.description: Whether to enable shell escaping with LaTeX documents.

restore_project_r_version.title: Restore project R version in RStudio Pro and RStudio Workbench
restore_project_r_version.description: Whether to restore the last version of R used by the project in RStudio Pro and RStudio Workbench.

clang_verbose.title: Clang verbosity level (0 - 2)
clang_verbose.description: The verbosity level to use with Clang (0 - 2)

submit_crash_reports.title: Submit crash reports to Posit
submit_crash_reports.description: Whether to automatically submit crash reports to Posit.

r_home.description: The home directory (R_HOME) for the R installation.

label.description: A free-form label for describing the R version.

module.description: The name of the environment module to load.

default_r_version.description: The R version to use by default.

data_viewer_max_columns.title: Maximum number of columns in data viewer
data_viewer_max_columns.description: The maximum number of columns to show at once in the data viewer.

data_viewer_max_cell_size.title: Maximum number of character in data viewer cells
data_viewer_max_cell_size.description: The maximum number of characters to show in a data viewer cell.

enable_screen_reader.title: Enable support for screen readers
enable_screen_reader.description: Support accessibility aids such as screen readers.

typing_status_delay_ms.title: Seconds to wait before updating ARIA live region
typing_status_delay_ms.description: Number of milliseconds to wait after last keystroke before updating live region.

reduced_motion.title: Reduced animation/motion mode
reduced_motion.description: Reduce use of animations in the user interface.

tab_key_move_focus.title: Tab key always moves focus
tab_key_move_focus.description: Tab key moves focus out of text editing controls instead of inserting tabs.

find_panel_legacy_tab_sequence.title: Tab key moves focus directly from find text to replace text in find panel
find_panel_legacy_tab_sequence.description: In source editor find panel, tab key moves focus directly from find text to replace text.

show_panel_focus_rectangle.title: Show focus outline around focused panel
show_panel_focus_rectangle.description: Show which panel contains keyboard focus.

auto_save_on_idle.title: Autosave mode on idle
auto_save_on_idle.description: How to deal with changes to documents on idle.

auto_save_idle_ms.title: Idle period for document autosave (ms)
auto_save_idle_ms.description: The idle period, in milliseconds, after which documents should be auto-saved.

auto_save_on_blur.title: Save documents when editor loses input focus
auto_save_on_blur.description: Whether to automatically save when the editor loses focus.

terminal_initial_directory.title: Initial working directory for new terminals

full_project_path_in_window_title.title: Show full path to project in RStudio Desktop windows
full_project_path_in_window_title.description: Whether to show the full path to project in desktop window title.

visual_markdown_editing_is_default.title: Use visual editing by default for new markdown documents
visual_markdown_editing_is_default.description: Whether to enable visual editing by default for new markdown documents

visual_markdown_editing_list_spacing.title: Default list spacing in visual markdown editing mode
visual_markdown_editing_list_spacing.description: Default spacing for lists created in the visual editor

visual_markdown_editing_wrap.title: Wrap text in visual markdown editing mode
visual_markdown_editing_wrap.description: Whether to automatically wrap text when writing markdown

visual_markdown_editing_wrap_at_column.title: Wrap column for visual markdown editing mode
visual_markdown_editing_wrap_at_column.description: The column to wrap text at when writing markdown

visual_markdown_editing_references_locat.title: Place visual markdown footnotes in
visual_markdown_editing_references_locat.description: Placement of footnotes within markdown output.

visual_markdown_editing_canonical.title: Write canonical visual mode markdown in source mode
visual_markdown_editing_canonical.description: Whether to write canonical visual mode markdown when saving from source mode.

visual_markdown_editing_max_content_widt.title: Max content width for visual markdown editor (px)
visual_markdown_editing_max_content_widt.description: Maximum content width for visual editing mode, in pixels

visual_markdown_editing_show_doc_outline.title: Show document outline in visual markdown editing mode
visual_markdown_editing_show_doc_outline.description: Whether to show the document outline by default when opening R Markdown documents in visual mode.

visual_markdown_editing_show_margin.title: Show margin in visual mode code blocks
visual_markdown_editing_show_margin.description: Whether to show the margin guide in the visual mode code blocks.

visual_markdown_code_editor_line_numbers.title: Show line numbers in visual mode code blocks
visual_markdown_code_editor_line_numbers.description: Whether to show line numbers in the code editors used in visual mode

visual_markdown_editing_font_size_points.title: Font size for visual editing mode
visual_markdown_editing_font_size_points.description: The default visual editing mode font size, in points

visual_markdown_code_editor.title: Editor for code chunks in visual editing mode
visual_markdown_code_editor.description: The name of the editor to use to provide code editing in visual mode

zotero_libraries.title: Zotero libraries
zotero_libraries.description: Zotero libraries to insert citations from.

disabled_aria_live_announcements.title: Disabled aria-live announcements
disabled_aria_live_announcements.description: List of aria-live announcements to disable.

screenreader_console_announce_limit.title: Maximum number of console lines to announce
screenreader_console_announce_limit.description: Maximum number of lines of console output announced after a command.

file_monitor_ignored_components.title: List of path components ignored by file monitor
file_monitor_ignored_components.description: List of path components; file monitor will ignore paths containing one or more of these components.

install_pkg_deps_individually.title: Install R package dependencies one at a time
install_pkg_deps_individually.description: Whether to install R package dependencies one at a time.

graphics_antialiasing.title: R graphics antialiasing method
graphics_antialiasing.description: Type of anti-aliasing to be used for generated R plots.

browser_fixed_width_fonts.description: List of fixed-width fonts to check for browser support.
browser_fixed_width_fonts.title: Fixed-width font list for RStudio Server

python_path.description: The path to the default Python interpreter.

save_retry_timeout.title: Save Retry Timeout
save_retry_timeout.description: The maximum amount of seconds of retry for save operations.

insert_native_pipe_operator.description: Whether the Insert Pipe Operator command should use the native R pipe operator, |>
insert_native_pipe_operator.title: Use R's native pipe operator, |>

command_palette_mru.description: Whether to keep track of recently used commands in the Command Palette
command_palette_mru.title: Remember recently used items in Command Palette

show_memory_usage.description: Whether to compute and show memory usage in the Environment Pane
show_memory_usage.title: Show memory usage in Environment Pane

memory_query_interval_seconds.description: How many seconds to wait between automatic requeries of memory statistics (0 to disable)
memory_query_interval_seconds.title: Interval for requerying memory stats (seconds)

terminal_python_integration.description: Enable Python terminal hooks. When enabled, the RStudio-configured version of Python will be placed on the PATH.
terminal_python_integration.title: Enable terminal Python integration

session_protocol_debug.description: Enable session protocol debug logging showing all session requests and events
session_protocol_debug.title: Session protocol debug logging

python_project_environment_automatic_act.description: When enabled, if the active project contains a Python virtual environment, then RStudio will automatically activate this environment on startup.
python_project_environment_automatic_act.title: Automatically activate project Python environments

check_null_external_pointers.description: When enabled, RStudio will detect R objects containing null external pointers when building the Environment pane, and avoid introspecting their contents further.
check_null_external_pointers.title: Check values in the Environment pane for null external pointers

autohide_menubar.title: Auto hide menu bar
autohide_menubar.description: Hide desktop menu bar until Alt key is pressed.

native_file_dialogs.description: Whether RStudio Desktop will use the operating system's native File and Message dialog boxes.
native_file_dialogs.title: Use native file and message dialog boxes

discard_pending_console_input_on_error.description: When enabled, any pending console input will be discarded when an (uncaught) R error occurs.
discard_pending_console_input_on_error.title: Discard pending console input on error

editor_scroll_multiplier.description: An integer value, 1-200, to set the editor scroll multiplier. The higher the value, the faster the scrolling.
editor_scroll_multiplier.title: Editor scroll speed sensitivity

text_rendering.title: Text rendering
text_rendering.description: Control how text is rendered within the IDE surface.

copilot_enabled.title: Enable GitHub Copilot
copilot_enabled.description: When enabled, RStudio will use GitHub Copilot to provide code suggestions.

copilot_completions_trigger.title: Show Copilot code suggestions:
copilot_completions_trigger.description: Control when Copilot code suggestions are displayed in the editor.

copilot_completions_delay.title: GitHub Copilot completions delay
copilot_completions_delay.description: The delay (in milliseconds) before GitHub Copilot completions are requested after the cursor position has changed.

copilot_tab_key_behavior.title: Pressing Tab key will prefer inserting:
copilot_tab_key_behavior.description: Control the behavior of the Tab key when both Copilot code suggestions and RStudio code completions are visible.

copilot_indexing_enabled.title: Index project files with GitHub Copilot
copilot_indexing_enabled.description: When enabled, RStudio will index project files with GitHub Copilot.

project_name.description: User-provided name for the currently opened R project.

run_background_job_default_working_dir.title: Default working directory for background jobs
run_background_job_default_working_dir.description: Default working directory in background job dialog.

code_formatter.title: Code formatter
code_formatter.description: The formatter to use when reformatting code.

code_formatter_styler_strict.title: Use strict transformers when formatting code
code_formatter_styler_strict.description: When set, strict transformers will be used when formatting code. See the `styler` package documentation for more details.

code_formatter_external_command.description: The external command to be used when reformatting code.

reformat_on_save.title: Reformat documents on save
reformat_on_save.description: When set, the selected formatter will be used to reformat documents on save.

project_user_data_directory.title: Default project user data directory
project_user_data_directory.description: The folder in which RStudio should store project .Rproj.user data.
